title: orderMessage
description: Details of a message for an Order.

objectType.description: The type of the object, orderMessage.

code.description: The code associated with this Message.

messageInformation.description: Additional (free form) information about the Message.

orderItemReference.description: A reference number that can be used to refer to the order item that this Message applies to.

correctionRequired.description: If true, indicates that this Message requires correction (via a corrective or supplemental Order).
